#  nst-slide-toggle

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description               | Type                  | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `checked`     | `checked`     | Is it on (checked)        | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `description` | `description` | Slide element description | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Is element disabled       | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `heading`     | `heading`     | Slide element heading     | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `icon`        | `icon`        | Icon name - material      | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `label`       | `label`       | Element label             | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `name`        | `name`        | Name of the element       | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `size`        | `size`        | Define size               | `"large" \| "medium"` | `'medium'`  |


## Events

| Event           | Description           | Type                   |
| --------------- | --------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `checkedChange` | Emits on slide change | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
